item.title: About Me
item.description: Hi I’m Sam - a budding hacker that likes to build technology and break it.

item.title: Projects
item.description: Gissue Github Pip Gissue is a CLI program for managing your Github issues for your project in the command line. It allows you to view all issues in a project and create new issues all without leaving your comfy terminal session. Shell Search Github NPM Quickly search google and open your browser window from the command line.
